name: Beougymas
description:
This game is supposed to be a sort of parody of the classic space shooters. Though I do not call myself a expert (actually far from it). I would appreciate if you downloaded it and reported some bugs. 

Controls

W is up

S is down

Development

Made in Godot Game Engine https://godotengine.org/

This is a very pre-alpha version right now its essentially a core game loop, wanted to see if it was fun.

Donations

*A donation would go exclusively to my education or improving the game*

If you donate, you are too generous.  Alot of people probably deserved it more than me, but you chose to donate to me. From the greatest parts of my hearts, Thank You. From the worst parts of my heart, Thank you.
